SELECT C.PAYMENTDATE, B.AMOUNT FROM (SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(A.PAYMENTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') PAYMENTDATE, LAST_VALUE(TOTAL) OVER(PARTITION BY TO_CHAR(A.PAYMENTDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ) AMOUNT FROM (SELECT PAYMENTDATE, TOTALPAYMENT, SUM(TOTALPAYMENT) OVER (ORDER BY PAYMENTDATE ROWS UNBOUNDED PRECEDING) TOTAL FROM PAYMENT ORDER BY PAYMENTDATE) A ORDER BY PAYMENTDATE) B JOIN (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - (LEVEL - 1), 'YYYY-MM-DD') PAYMENTDATE
FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7) C ON B.PAYMENTDATE=C.PAYMENTDATE
